channel.title: Space technology of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space technology of the day.

item.title: Space Probe Taurus
item.description: Space Probe Taurus (a.k.a. Space Monster) is a 1965 low budget black-and-white science fiction/action/drama film from American International Pictures, written and directed by Leonard Katzman, and starring Francine York, James E. Brown, Baynes Barrow, and Russ Bender.
